actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax credits for making energy efficiency improvements to existing homes and for constructing new energy efficient homes.
short_title: Save America's Valuable Energy Resources Act of 2005

summary.text: Save America's Valuable Energy Resources Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish tax credits for: (1) qualified energy efficient improvements to existing homes; and (2) the construction of qualified new energy efficient homes. Allows a tax deduction for energy efficient commercial building property expenditures.

titles.title: Save America's Valuable Energy Resources Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax credits for making energy efficiency improvements to existing homes and for constructing new energy efficient homes.
